subject: CNN.com Daily Top 10
body:
CNN.com Daily Top 10


































Quake raises PT boat from sea
Wreckage from World War II torpedo boat was tossed up from sea in Solomon Islands after 8.1 earthquake hit area in early April





2. WW II sex slave speaks out





3. MIT admissions dean resigns





4. Top al Qaeda figure moved 





5. Birkhead, baby can leave Bahamas





6. Editorial prompts teacher transfer





7. Review: 'Next' finishes last





8. Fire forces hundreds from homes 





9. Saudis say they've busted massive terror plot 





10. Schools: Cheaters using iPods




 
















The Bush Dance
Jeanne Moos follows the fancy footwork of President Bush, as he dances his way across the small screen (April 27)





2. Deer run into retirement home 





3. Hawking goes weightless 





4. Teen breezes through college 





5. Dad, son caught in twisters 





6. Saudi anti-terror raid 





7. South Georgia wildfires 





8. D.C. follies 





9. Baldwin's tirade
